connectionSpecification.title: Source Google Search Console Singer Spec

credentials_json.description: The contents of the JSON service account key. See the docs for more information on how to generate this key.

email.description: The email of the user, which has permissions to access the Google Workspace Admin APIs.

site_urls.description: Website URL properties in a comma delimited list; do not include the domain-level property in the list

start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

user_agent.description: Tap name with the api user email address
